prompt.content: By how much did DUOL's deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions increase during 2024? Express your answer in $ millions rounded to one decimal.

rubrics.name: Identify the deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions formula as Formula: 2024 Subscription Bookings - 2024 Subscription Revenue

messages.content: Identify the deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions formula as Formula: 2024 Subscription Bookings - 2024 Subscription Revenue

rubrics.name: Find Subscription bookings from item 7 = $730.737 million

messages.content: Find Subscription bookings from item 7 = $730.737 million

rubrics.name: Find Subscription revenue from item 7 = $607.531 million

messages.content: Find Subscription revenue from item 7 = $607.531 million

rubrics.name: Rounded the difference to one decimal place = $123.2 million (Final Answer: $123.2 million)

messages.content: Rounded the difference to one decimal place = $123.2 million (Final Answer: $123.2 million)
